fields.name: fpsDetailsModalPath
fields.label: FPS Details Modal Path
fields.description: Path to the FPS details modal content page (default: /content/asus-cto/language-master/en/modals/fps-details)

fields.name: timeSpyScoreModalPath
fields.label: Time Spy Score Modal Path
fields.description: Path to the Time Spy Score modal content page (default: /content/asus-cto/language-master/en/modals/time-spy-score)

fields.name: dataSourceTooltip
fields.label: Data Source Tooltip
fields.description: Tooltip text for the data source information icon (default: All FPS performance data presented are theoretical...)
fields.value: All FPS performance data presented are theoretical and may vary in real-world usage. The FPS data is based on third-party testing conducted by UL and is provided for reference purposes only. Actual performance may differ.

fields.name: threeMarkLogo
fields.label: 3DMark Logo
fields.description: Image path for the 3DMark logo displayed in the Time Spy Score section
